original_title: Making It Stick: The Makeup Effects of Stuck on You
overview: We find notes from the Farrellys, Damon, Kinnear, Thomas, Wessler and special make-up designer Tony Gardner. The latter participant dominates the show as he lets us know about the design of the conjoined rig, the various challenges and its execution. We also learn about general issues and the way the actors related to each other.
title: Making It Stick: The Makeup Effects of Stuck on You
